open "Delete" dialog window

[560934] Improve protected elements deletion

- Error message weren't logged
- Dialog doesn't had default height
- Command name wasn't 'Delete' in undo, but 'Confirmation Deletion'.

[560934] Fix scenario deletion issue and improve decoration

- It was not possible to delete Scenario anymore, as Sequence Message
were protected. This is no longer the case
- The lock decorator is now available in 'Preferences > General >
Appearance > Label and Decorators' and can be enabled in Project
Explorer
- Updated documentation
